summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Ward Street; East Ward Street, from 24th Avenue North to 25th Avenue North; 25th Avenue North, from East Ward Street to East Helen Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6246, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
